page.title: 20Windsor Safari Park
page.content: { Windsor Safari Park}was opened in 1970, and covers one hundred and sixty acres. The Park is open every day except for Christmas Day. The entrance fee is Â£4.50 for adults and Â£3.50 for children and O.A.P.'s. There are thirty five species of {mammals,}four species of{reptiles}and twenty species of{birds}kept in the Safari Park. The animals are able to roam uncaged in the{Safari Area,}but others are caged. There are three pools in the {dolphinarium,}the main pool, the back pool and the winter pool, which is for sick animals. There are two{killer {whales}and seven{dolphins}and these give shows throughout the day. The {first baby dolphins}to be born in Britain can be seen there. One is one year old and the other is one week old.
